title: Crashed
body:
I have the 20min queu timer because my pc restarted, and I  was waiting, and the timer was like at 4/5 min left. But then, it crashed, idk what or why but it crashed and i had to wait another 20 min. T=T
But yeah :3

replies.body: I don't recommend queuing up for another game until this crashed is resolved, though I'm, sorry it's resulted in a queue timer.  :/  Are you getting any error messages?  When or where exactly is it happening?  Toss me some more info, and I'll help dig into this!
